trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs" /> that contains the component or <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that changed.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed" /> event raised when a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> or component is changed during design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示當 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed" /> 或元件在設計階段期間變更時，會處理所引發 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventHandler> delegate to handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event when a type or component changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventHandler>委派以處理<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>事件類型或元件變更時。

trans-unit.source: In the code, the `OnRefreshed` event handles the event and displays the component being changed.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼的`OnRefreshed`事件處理事件，並顯示所要變更的元件。

trans-unit.source: The code assumes that a `TextBox` control is already sited on the form.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會假設`TextBox`已設置控制項在表單上。
